namespace_definition.note: There is no namespace for Bitnami packages.

name_definition.note: The name is the component name. It must be lowercased.
normalization_rules: It is not case sensitive and must be lowercased.

version_definition.native_name: full package version, including version and revision
version_definition.note: The version is the full Bitnami package version, which follows a 'version[-revision]' format (e.g., 6.2.0 or 5.8.3-1). If omitted, the PURL refers to the latest available version for the specified distribution.

qualifiers_definition.description: The qualifier for package architecture. The value must be one of the enumerated examples. It defaults to 'amd64' if not specified.
The qualifier for the Linux distribution associated with the package. This is required to uniquely identify a package artifact.
